Episodes.Title: Darkness Falls
Episodes.Plot: Darkness falls... and Europe falls under Nazi control. America was unprepared for joining the war and got hit hard with the attack on Pearl Harbor. North Africa and Guadalcanal were the first bloody battlegrounds.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Bruce Kennedy, Liz Reph

Episodes.Title: Hard Way Back
Episodes.Plot: The Allies take on the daunting forces of the Axis, with victory far from certain. Charles Scheffel battles Rommel's forces in Tunisia and Jack Werner faces bitter combat in the northern Pacific.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Liz Rep

Episodes.Title: Bloody Resolve
Episodes.Plot: The Marines assault Tarawa in one of the bloodiest battles yet waged. MacArthur island-hops and Italy's front lines claim a casualty.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Liz Rep

Episodes.Title: Battle Stations
Episodes.Plot: The Allies lay plans for the invasion of France; Bert Stiles and the 8th Air Force attempt to clear the skies over Normandy, while the Pacific remains a quagmire. D-Day arrives.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Liz Rep

Episodes.Title: Day of Days
Episodes.Plot: The Allies are bogged down in Normandy's hedgerows in the aftermath of D-Day, while on Saipan, victory turns to horror.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Liz Rep

Episodes.Title: Point of No Return
Episodes.Plot: The Allies race toward Germany as American Marines battle for ground on Peleliu and across the bloody Pacific.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Alec Mi

Episodes.Title: Striking Distance
Episodes.Plot: American forces storm the Philippines while Shelby Westbrook is shot down over Europe. Jack Yusen battles the dangers of the deep when his ship is sunk after a heroic duel.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Alec Mi

Episodes.Title: Glory and Guts
Episodes.Plot: The Marine assault on Iwo Jima brings horror and glory. Pilot Bert Stiles engages a German fighter with disastrous consequences. Reinforcements arrive in Europe to push the Allies toward victory.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Bruce Kennedy, Alec Mi

Episodes.Title: Edge of the Abyss
Episodes.Plot: The Battle of the Bulge pushes the Allies to the brink, and Rockie Blunt barely survives the fight. Okinawa erupts as the Japanese make their last stand. Hitler is handed a final ultimatum.
Episodes.Writer: Matthew Ginsburg, Bruce Kennedy, Alec Michod

Episodes.Title: End Game
Episodes.Plot: With the end in sight, Okinawa is a bloody obstacle to victory. The third Reich ends with a single gunshot. America delivers the final blow to Japan and the world celebrates the fall of the Axis.
Episodes.Writer: Hunter Dunn, Matthew Ginsburg, Ben Kaplan, Alec Mich
